name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of October 30, in Nanchang, Jiangxi, a boy from Nanchang Institute of Technology stabbed a girl with a knife. Insider: suspected emotional dispute.
The video shows that the girl kept making heart-wrenching cries "Help, I was wrong"
But the boy had no intention of stopping and continued to stab the other party.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of October 30, Qionghai City, Hainan Province. 
The Niululing Reservoir upstream of the Wanquan River released floodwaters, causing the water level of the Wanquan River to rise rapidly, and the downstream Qionghai City and 123 villages were flooded.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 30, a notice about the closure of Shanghai Zhongshan Park on Halloween was posted at the Tepper School of Business at Pennsylvania State University and Carnegie Mellon University.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a man posted a video about how he raised ants, and then the video was removed.
The man posted a recording saying that his video was removed because it "contained metaphors."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
October 30, Kunming, Yunnan. A rice noodle shop named "Taiwan will not be named until it returns to the motherland" 
The owner of the shop also angrily responded to the customer who gave a bad review on Meituan: Without our powerful motherland, you would have died long ago. When Taiwan returns, I will open a shop in Taiwan to make your mental state even worse!

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 30, a blogger revealed that there was a group of self-media marketing accounts on the social platform that pretended to be debtors. They cried in front of the camera and said the same lines, saying that they were "in debt of more than 1 million yuan and had just been kicked out by their families." The blogger said: Their acting skills can beat young actors in seconds.
And when you add these marketing accounts on WeChat, they will then introduce projects to you to cut leeks.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 31, it was reported that Wu Xiaolei, a Chinese student who was sentenced for threatening pro-democracy figures in the United States, had his sentence commuted and returned to China. He was originally sentenced to nine months in prison, but actually served about three months.
Wu Xiaolei threatened to chop off the hands of Zoe (pseudonym), a pro-democracy activist, and reported her family to the Chinese police.
After being released, Wu Xiaolei sent a threatening message to Zoe's friend, "Do you really think that I can't find you if you wear a mask and change your voice at the Voice of America?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a chat record of the "Guangdong Zeng Clan Family Group" was circulated online, saying that this year it was discovered that many younger generations could not speak Cantonese. After discussion among the elders, if this situation still occurs next year, both parents will be punished with three sticks, or the family dividends will be cancelled, and the clan members will declare Cantonese as their first language. 
It was also said that forgetting the mother tongue is to cut off the foundation of Chinese culture, which is unpatriotic and disloyal.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The largest fine in human history has appeared.
Russia fined Google: 
2,500,000,000,000,000,000,000,000,000,000,000,000,000. The amount of the fine far exceeds the total global GDP.
It is reported that a Russian court imposed the above fine on Google because the YouTube platform blocked a number of Russian TV channels.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 30, population scholar Liang Jianzhang suggested: Pay close attention to the anti-marriage and anti-childbearing public opinion trends. Comments such as "Not having children is a kind of kindness, not having children is a weakness" seriously endanger the public interest and national population security. Pensions should be linked to fertility incentives.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Just now, Hu Xijin returned to Weibo after being banned for 3 months

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, blogger "Feng Ge Fu Ming Tian Ya" was targeted by a kidnapping gang while working in Ukraine. One of the gang members was named "Zhang Xiaoqiang" from Gansu, China. The gang used a woman named "Emily" as bait to lure Feng Ge into the gang. However, the clever Feng Ge used "Emily" to continuously pass misleading information to the other party, so he escaped.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 31, Guangzhou Metro opened a makeup removal area specifically for Halloween.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 30, the South Korean media JoongAng Ilbo quoted an insider as saying: "On the 25th, Ukrainian troops entered the occupied western region of Russia" and the first battle with the North Korean army had taken place in the Kursk region.
The North Korean troops sent to Russia fought with the Ukrainian army for the first time. Only one member of the Korean People's Army survived, and all the rest were killed. North Koreans hold Buryat ID cards.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some comments said that the Guangzhou Metro opened a makeup removal area to prevent wanted criminals and spies from mixing into the crowd, which aroused everyone's agreement

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of October 31st, on the streets of Shibuya, Tokyo.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: "This prosperous age is what you wish for"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 30, a netizen submitted an article criticizing historical nihilism at a domestic university.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A university in Dongguan notified that from the 31st to the 3rd, all communities are prohibited from gathering for group building and entertainment.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the morning of October 30, at the entrance of Zhengzhou Institute of Science and Technology in Henan Province, construction workers blocked the school gate to demand their wages and prevented students from entering or leaving. According to netizens, the school enrolls nearly 10,000 students a year, with a total number of students exceeding 30,000. Each student pays more than 20,000 yuan in tuition fees, and spent 7 billion yuan last year to build a new campus.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to the Japanese Consulate General in Shanghai, for safety reasons, the Shanghai Japanese School will switch to online classes on December 13, the anniversary of the Nanjing Massacre.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 31 (released), netizens submitted articles and found that a large number of advertisements recruiting volunteers to donate blood for a fee appeared in Jinan. Selling 400 ml of blood can get a reward of 300 yuan, which is called "lost work wages". Blood sellers need to complete the blood donation process voluntarily, and certificates and other gifts will also be given.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a Russian BTR tank was shot at close range by a Ukrainian tank in Kursk. There was a 19-year-old Russian soldier in the car. He was abandoned by his comrades after being seriously injured. He lay there waiting for two days but no one rescued him. 
Finally, he was found by the Ukrainian army and treated on the spot to save his life. He said that the Russian soldiers were sent to the battlefield like meat, and it was thanks to the Ukrainians that he was saved.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A college counselor in Sichuan asked cadres to monitor students who wanted to attend the Halloween gathering and asked them not to tell other students about this.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
October 31, Yuyuan Road, Shanghai.
A woman wearing Hanfu was taken away by the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 31, the National Bureau of Statistics reported that the average daily labor time of residents was less than 3.5 hours, and the average daily sleep and rest time was 9 hours and 46 minutes. This was ridiculed by many netizens.
Netizens responded: "If I average it with Jack Ma, I am also a rich man"
"I work at least 12 hours a day, and a family of six only works 2 hours on average"
